name: Trash Companion
description:
Trash Companion is a casual game made for Wowie Jam 4.0 in approximately 72 hours. Help a malfunctioning vacuum bot to collect all the trash from the rooms in the spaceship. 

Minimum Specs - It should run on most laptops and PCs (optimized for maximum inclusiveness)

Made by Kalin Richmond and Noah Bello

Modeling/Texturing: Noah Bello (and Dall.E 2 for wall art and chip bags)

Level Design: Noah Bello, Kalin Richmond

Programming: Kalin Richmond

Sound Design: Kalin Richmond
